title: Many apps won't open. Like baking, social media and even google assistant. It instantly crashes.
content: After downloading a few pdfs from my bank the bank app stopped working. After restarting the phone it went back to normal briefly. Then on to tiktok direct message not opening then other banking apps and even google assistant. I've restarted the device, cleared cache and data, cleared out space, deleted the apps, checked for updates. To no fruition.
